featured.text: Until then, people did not usually eat or drink anything between lunch and dinner.
I usually eat lunch from twelve to one and generally take a fifteen-minute break in the morning and in the afternoon.
During the lunch hour, Jane her notes so she would remember them for the test.

definition.zh_def: 午餐，通常在中午時分吃的餐點。
definition.en_def: A meal eaten in the middle of the day.
definition.example: I usually have a sandwich for lunch.
